Yonatan Lourie (under maintainence)

I’m Yonatan, a grad student at Tel Aviv University (TAU), specializing in Statistics and Data Science. In addition to my studies, I’m also gaining practical experience as a part of the data science team at Forter. I have a strong passion for machine learning, statistics, and data analysis, along with strong computer science skills including OOP and experience with technologies like spark, git, docker, elasticSearch, jenkins and more.
